select * from ET_SRCB_REP WHERE YEAR = #{Year} and MONTH = #{Month}

select * from ( select YEARã€€as YEAR, MONTH as MONTH, SUM(DDL01) as DDL01, SUM(DDL02) as DDL02, SUM(DDE01) as DDE01, SUM(DDE02) as DDE02, SUM(XSL01) as XSL01, SUM(XSL02) as XSL02, SUM(XSL03) as XSL03, SUM(XSL04) as XSL04, SUM(CKL01) as CKL01, SUM(CKL02) as CKL02, SUM(KCL01) as KCL01, SUM(KCL02) as KCL02, SUM(KCL03) as KCL03, SUM(KCL04) as KCL04, SUM(KCZE01) as KCZE01, SUM(KCZE02) as KCZE02, SUM(XSSR01) as XSSR01, SUM(XSSR02) as XSSR02, SUM(CCL01) as CCL01, SUM(CKSR01) as CKSR01, SUM(CKSR02) as CKSR02 from ET_SRCB_REP GROUP BY (YEAR,MONTH) ORDER BY YEAR,MONTH DESC ) T WHERE rownum <= 12
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ET_PROFIT_REP ( YEAR, MONTH, CPBM, DDL01, DDL02, DDE01, DDE02, XSL01, XSL02, XSL03, XSL04, CKL01, CKL02, KCL01,KCL02, KCL03, KCL04, KCZE01, KCZE02, XSSR01, XSSR02, CCL01, CKSR01, CKSR02 ) VALUES ( #{Year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CPBM,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{DDL01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{DDL02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{DDE01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{DDE02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSL01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSL02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSL03,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSL04,jdbcType=DEC}, #{CKL01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{CKL02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCL01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCL02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCL03,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCL04,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCZE01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{KCZE02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSSR01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{XSSR02,jdbcType=DEC}, #{CCL01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{CKSR01,jdbcType=DEC}, #{CKSR02,jdbcType=DEC} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ET_PROFIT_REP SET DDL01= #{DDL01,jdbcType=DEC}, DDL02= #{DDL02,jdbcType=DEC}, DDE01= #{DDE01,jdbcType=DEC}, DDE02= #{DDE02,jdbcType=DEC}, XSL01= #{XSL01,jdbcType=DEC}, XSL02= #{XSL02,jdbcType=DEC}, XSL03= #{XSL03,jdbcType=DEC}, XSL04= #{XSL04,jdbcType=DEC}, CKL01= #{CKL01,jdbcType=DEC}, CKL02= #{CKL02,jdbcType=DEC}, KCL01=#{KCL01,jdbcType=DEC}, KCL02= #{KCL02,jdbcType=DEC}, KCL03= #{KCL03,jdbcType=DEC}, KCL04= #{KCL04,jdbcType=DEC}, KCZE01= #{KCZE01,jdbcType=DEC}, KCZE02= #{KCZE02,jdbcType=DEC}, XSSR01= #{XSSR01,jdbcType=DEC}, XSSR02= #{XSSR02,jdbcType=DEC}, CCL01= #{CCL01,jdbcType=DEC}, CKSR01= #{CKSR01,jdbcType=DEC}, CKSR02= #{CKSR02,jdbcType=DEC}
WHERE YEAR = #{Year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MONTH = #{Month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CPBM= #{CPBM,jdbcType=CHAR}
